body.name: AIRROMI Air Purifier for Bedroom with True H13 HEPA 3-in-1 Filters, Pet Air Purifiers for Home Cat Pee Smell, Covers Up to 983 Ft², Quiet 360° intake Air Cleaner for Allergies Dust Smoke Odor Dander
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 56 mins
features: ❤️【Super Purification】: Our Size: 6.9"D x 12.4"W x 6.9"H, though this portable air purifier is compact, it can generates more than 673.6gal/2550L clean air /min. AIRROMI A2001 bedroom air purifier utilizes 2023 newly advanced filter system: 40 ppi pre-filter, True H13 HEPA filter, and activated carbon filter. This combination effectively captures 99.97% of particles as small as 0.3 microns, including pet dander, pollen, smoke, odors, dust and hair. AIRROMI just want to help you to breath the cleaner air. And it's also the best Christmas gifts.

🍀【360° Effective Purification】:Thanks to a large air intake at the bottom, AIRROMI air purifiers has a 360° air intake, so air will enter from all directions, create a effective purification. Btw, with CARD 153 m³/h,Our air purifier produces clean air up can coverage up to 983 square inches room.（Different countries have different formulas for calculating area. It means it can cover up two small rooms or one large room.) When you need to replace it, you will be shocked at how strong the adsorption capacity of the old filter.

👑【Widely Use】：A 18W energy-saving long-life motor suitable for everyone. If you are a pet owner, I guess we can perfectly meet your require, cause this purifier can effectively absorb cat litter smell or dog hair, our air cleaner has 3 wind speeds, you can adjust the appropriate mode according to your needs. Btw, after cooking, you don't need to open the window, the purifier will help you to clean the air. And it also good for smokers, babies or children, and suitable for living rooms, bedroom, dorm, kitchen, office, nursery or apartment.

💧【Easy to Use & with H13 HEPA Filter Replacement Alarm】:AIRROMI air purifiers are easy to install with a concise instruction manual. And when the air purifier needs to be replaced, the button of the screen will flash a yellow light to remind you. You just need to hold down the button for 3-5s, then replace the filter.【The replacement HEPA filter should be replaced every 3-6 months depending on the environment and usage frequency. And purifier must match original filters, or it might be damage. (Filters search for ASIN B0C4P3XCP6 on Amazon).】

🌺【Air Purifier with Scents】: AIRROMI air purifier with aromatherapy, which offer a place for scented oil, you can drop some sleep aid essential oil on the aroma pad on top of the air purifiers, you will enjoy a high quality sleeping! 【Note:Different aroma essential oils will cause different effect, which depending on the flavor of themselves.】If you meet any problems in the use process, pls feel free to contact us, we will be very glad to receive your letter, cause we are a company that pays attention to product quality and user experience.

🌜【Air Purifier Quiet & Earned the Certified】:The noise level of the hepa filter air purifiers is as low as 23 dB, is as silent as your own breath, ensuring a peaceful and undisturbed environment while still providing effective purification. And you don't need to worry about the quality of the product, all of our materials are carefully selected, and the air purifier has also undergone multiple quality tests, which earned the certified of CARB/EPA/ETL/CA65/FCC.

⏰【Home Air Cleaner with Perfect Sleep Mode - Turn On/Off Night Light, 3 Timers, 3 Wind Speeds】: When you go to sleep, you can choose 1/2/3 wind speeds according to your prefer. And you can also choose the hepa air purifier timer if you need it, our timer has 3 modes: 2H 4H 8H. If you need a night light, the energy-saving lights of AIRROMI bedroom air purifier can be left on all night, which is a comfortable light, and of course, you can choose to turn off, depending on your personal preferences and needs.

😊【Excellent Design & 2 Years Guarantee】: According to carefully designed, AIRROMI air purifier has a high-end appearance, this is the first use in the air purifiers industry, we've achieved a dipped and brushed metal texture on appearance, giving the air purifiers a stylish and sophisticated look. Almost everyone will marvel at this portable air purifier. And AIRROMI provide you with a 2-year replacement warranty, please rest assured.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Selected this model after checking reviews. It arrived quickly and in good condition. Read the instructions and put in the 10'x12' room. Within an hour I noticed a difference in the air quality and was satisfied with the performance. While the purifier does make a noticeable sound, it is similar to what one could expect from a room fan. Satisfied with the purchase and am considering buying another one to put into a second room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So glad I got this!
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier is so easy to use. Very quiet and the fact that you can add essential oils is a great perk.I put this in the room where the kitty litter is and it works great. I highly recommend! Just a note to pet owners, cats and dogs usually don't like citrus smells (lemon, orange, grapefruit, etc.) But just like us they have scent preferences as well. So if you're using this to control pet odors near a litter box you may want to do some research as to what scents animals like and don't like so you don't accidently repel your pet from their litter box or sleeping area. Or, of course, you may opt out of the use of essential oils in a pet area if you are unsure. Either way, it works great. I just know some people buy this because of pet odor so I thought I would mention the oils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well, haven’t tried using the scents yet but overall it cleans the air and not noisy at all. Decent size too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little purifier!
reviews.reviewText: Got this in today and put it in my bedroom! I had another brand in there but changed it out for this one because it has a place where I can add my essential ! Can smell it working now and I’m in another part of my home! Like that it has a light than can be turned off if you dont like light shining at night! The light just makes the room just bright enough that you don’t have to turn on your over head light to see! So far I liking this unit no issues worked great right out of the box! Would highly recommend! Just wish the other colors had been available on Amazon! Would love to have had the Lavendar one! When I hey ready to order another one maybe that color will be on the site! Really like the fan speed and the timer control! Can set for 2,4,or 8 hours or u can bypass and run it continuously! Great little unit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Small enough to put on nightstand. But big enough to get the job done to purify the room. Love the way it looks. The only drawback is, the aromatherapy doesn't work. Don't really see how it could work the way it is setup. Other than that, I'm happy with product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Received quickly, easy to get started. Haven’t had much time to use it but I’m hoping it will help with my granddaughters allergy’s. Running fine nice and quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am SUPER SATISFIED with this product. It is sooooo easy to use and the instructions are so clear and simple. It has three-hour settings and will run 2 hours, 4 hours, or 8 hours. It also has three air strength levels, low, medium, and high. I have set it up near my air return in my house on medium and run it for 8 hours during the day and 4 hours when I get home at night. I have not used the sent compartment where you can drop scented oils because I don't have scented oils; however, I do use wall-scented plug-ins and have placed this air filter near my air return and scented wall plug-in, I can honestly say this has moved the good smell throughout the house. I live in a small home, a little over 1000 sqft. but this size is perfect for my home. I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Also serves as a good noise machine. 3 settings for speeds. The oil scent part doesn't work well, we tried different scents and brands and they don't work well. Can't smell them. But it is cleaning the air. I'd get it again and not worry about one with an oil scent spot.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality quiet filter perfect for my bedroom.
reviews.reviewText: I really like the air purifier. It is very effective and super quiet. I have purchased multiple of them because they are very great deal and good quality. Also very good customer service. Would purchase again.

The purifier does a really great job and it’s not too loud. Within the first 6 hours I noticed a difference in the quality of our air. I’ve purchased 2 of them but unfortunately the lights on the second one does not turn off. Haven’t used the aroma diffuser pads yet.

Works well however when turned to level 2 or higher it can be quite noisyIt also comes with essential oil discs but upon putting a few drops of essential oil on the disc I’ve noticed that there is no air flow to disperse the aroma 🙄 Oh well it does the job of cleaning the air and was a fair price

With the three speed option, it allows me to keep it operating while I sleep using the lowest setting. There is a definite difference in air quality in my bedroom that improves my quality of sleep. I'll keep it on the medium setting during the day to keep the room fresh.
